title: Two marine sulfur-reducing bacteria co-culture is essential for productive infection by a T4-like Escherichia coli-infecting phage
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Adriele Jéssica do Carmo Santos, Roberto Sousa Dias, Jéssica Duarte Silva, Maíra de Paula Sousa, Wellington Ronildo Clarindo, Cynthia Canêdo da Silva, Sérgio Oliveira de Paula
